availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza F. DeJarnette. Father of Benjamin DeJarnette, Francis DeJarnette, John DeJarnette, Julia DeJarnette, Melvina DeJarnette, George DeJarnette, and E. DeJarnette. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 96.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 28.
Find A Grave, "George DeJarnette (October 15, 1819-July 3, 1897)," Memorial #90196481, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90196481 (accessed April 10, 2017).
